message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for sale at $150. I believe it's a great deal and will be valuable to you.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Can you meet me there?
Thanks for your interest, Bob.  While $90 is a bit too low for me, I could be willing to come down to $130. I believe this product will bring you a lot of value.
I'm still interested in the product, but $130 is a bit out of my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $110?
